description: This file defines a ViewModel class for managing device scan results and connection states in an Android application, utilizing Android Architecture Components and Kotlin Coroutines.

classes.name: DevicesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel managing device scan results and connection actions, exposing state flows and control methods to the UI.

methods.name: start
methods.description: No-operation placeholder method, possibly for future extension.

methods.description: Initiates the device scan process by delegating to the repository.

methods.description: Stops the ongoing device scan by delegating to the repository.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects to a specific device, delegating the action to the repository.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects the current device connection via the repository.
